welcome_message_body: "Welcome to East Cocalico, a charming city known for its rich history and warm hospitality. We hope you have an unforgettable time exploring our beautiful town and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lancaster Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal/Spaatz Field Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Municipal/Spaatz Field Airport serves private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
